name: HexaDungeon
description:
Game has  power ups, which will unlock after Player will progress the game.

There's 3.power ups

  1.  Bomb (select radius of tiles around)
  2. Rainbow (select all tiles of the same color)
  3. Sandhour (add more remaining time for actual level)

When player's Hero will contact with enemy, then enemy's icon will appear in the Game Field. Player then have 2-3. turns to get rid of that icon with that enemy.
